channel.title: CVE Feed for Kazuho Oku -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Kazuho Oku -- all products

item.title: CVE-2017-10869|2024-08-05T17:50:12.563Z -- kazuho%20oku -- h2o
item.description: Buffer overflow in H2O version 2.2.2 and earlier allows remote attackers to cause a denial-of-service in the server via unspecified vectors.

item.title: CVE-2017-10868|2024-08-05T17:50:12.720Z -- kazuho%20oku -- h2o
item.description: H2O version 2.2.2 and earlier allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service in the server via specially crafted HTTP/1 header.

item.title: CVE-2017-10872|2024-08-05T17:50:12.503Z -- kazuho%20oku -- h2o
item.description: H2O version 2.2.3 and earlier allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service in the server via unspecified vectors.

item.title: CVE-2018-0608|2024-08-05T03:28:11.160Z -- kazuho%20oku -- h2o
item.description: Buffer overflow in H2O version 2.2.4 and earlier allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code or cause a denial of service (DoS) via unspecified vectors.

item.title: CVE-2017-10908|2024-08-05T17:50:12.443Z -- kazuho%20oku -- h2o
item.description: H2O version 2.2.3 and earlier allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service in the server via specially crafted HTTP/2 header.
